sense.def:
To want something
pomeni čutiti željo ali potrebo, da bi nekaj imeli.

seg.quote: Do you want a cup of coffee?
All they want is a holiday.
I want to be an actress.
I didn't want him to go.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
wants doing
, obstaja potreba, da je tisto storjeno.

seg.quote: We've got a couple of jobs that want doing in the garden.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
you want to do a particular thing
nekomu svetujemo, naj tisto stori.

seg.quote: You want to book your holiday early this year.

sense.def:
To be wanted
pomeni, da nekoga išče policija.

seg.quote: He is wanted for the crimes of murder and kidnapping.

sense.def:
A want of something
je odsotnost nečesa;

seg.quote: They had to confess their complete want of foresight.
For want of anything better to do, he continued to read.
